title: Flex q???? Placements are they messed up???
body:
I've finished my placements, I'm currently plat 2 in rank and i got gold 4 after going 6/4 when i have friends that are Gold or Silver that manage to go the same if not 7/3 and get platinum 1 is this placements stuff messed up or is it really that retarded :(

PS. i don't mind where i got placed i know i can easy climb out just i want to know if this is wrongly placed or messed up

replies.body: won 8/10 placements puts me in bronze 5

It's messed up and the system is _actually_ broken (not just "qq illaoi is broken" broken either). Anybody that has played flex queue since it opened has been subject to the ridiculous matchmaking that is screwing everything up as well as the placements. [Riot are looking into the issue](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues), and will be coming up with a solution in the next week or so ~
